title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs with parmesan and pepper.
Combine hot pasta with pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Sauté onions, add tomato puree, and simmer.
Add chicken and cream, cook until heated through.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir fry with mixed vegetables.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic cookies with chocolate chips, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cream butter and sugar together.
Beat in the egg and vanilla extract.
Stir in flour and chocolate chips.
Scoop onto a baking tray and bake for 10-12 minutes.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Chop lettuce and place in a bowl.
Add croutons and parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss gently.
Season with black pepper before serving.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Tasty tacos filled with seasoned ground beef and fresh toppings.
instructions: Cook ground beef in a pan until browned.
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer for 5 minutes.
Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
Serve with salsa or hot sauce.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes perfect for breakfast or brunch.
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl.
In another bowl, whisk egg and milk, then add melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Cook on a hot griddle until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden.

title: Mushroom Risotto
summary: Creamy risotto with mushrooms and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté onions until translucent.
Add mushrooms and cook until soft.
Stir in rice, then gradually add broth, stirring frequently.
Cook until rice is al dente, then stir in parmesan cheese.
Serve hot.
